item.title: Blunts or Bowls
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

[quote=“thepinksock, post:51, topic:380147”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=475989.msg3497074#msg3497074 date=1297407733]
I don’t think we should be discussing price, but…:

I snort heroin. It works pretty well for a delivery system. I pay $10 a “bag”. There is way more than a bump. You could span it to a few lines though. I snort the whole thing at once though.
[/quote]
Have you ever tried injecting?[/quote]
total feels good man
but really if you do it snort it for the first time or plug. shit gets addicting though so beware

Read full topic

item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

The best way to smoke is Vaporizer, but if you really want to get technical then I’d say cook that shit in brownies!! But I prefer Blunts, even though it is a waste of weed but I really only smoke reggie, but if i get some dank I’d take the bitch to a Bong and or a Bowl… All depends on the type of weed… should be more specific in the topic.

thepinksock:

i’m interested in heroin atm, how do you take it and whats the usual price

sorry I didn’t even know this thread was still alive

you can snort, plug, inject, or smoke
i mean they all have there ups and downs
its about 10$ a bag which is .1 gram. its like one hit or one bump… if you did it your first time i’d do a little more than 1 bag maybe like 1.5

item.title: Blunts or Bowls
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

I make the classic tin foil ontop of a water bottle bong when i’ve got nothing else occasionally i make a fancy homemade bong.
But truth is blunts are amazing, rolling one is the fun of smoking weed and you can better control how much smoke you intake.
In my opinion joints/blunts get you wayyy higher anyways.

That’s a rather nice blunt you have there. +1 for you. Makes me wish I took more pictures of my smoke sesh adventures
[/quote]I wish I had videos of some of the bong rips I’ve been able to manage.[/quote]
I always think the same thing, like “damn, why wouldn’t I have recorded that”. But at the moment I’m most likely already high and just don’t care about my phone and care about the herb I’m about to punish my lungs with.

item.title: Blunts or Bowls
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:31, topic:380147”]Cus smoking plastic makes you so fucking badass[/quote]I’ve had one of those highlighter pipes before and the part that comes out (the bowl) was completely metal on mine, it was just painted to look like the rest of the highlighter.

[quote=“Pwnd, post:28, topic:380147”]Why does Bebe only come here to talk about drugs anymore?[/quote] Well that’s rather funny actually because I’ve been more active on SRL lately and every time I seem to get directed towards these forums again there is a drug topic active. Since my drug use is well know, then why not post on the topics I have knowledge and interest in.

also Robert, instead of the WaWa (I love WaWa<3) bottle, you should try two Smart Water bottles fitted together.
Take the first smart water bottle and cut the top off of it. take the other smart water bottle and poke holes through the bottom of it. Fit that to the bottle with the top cut off and now you have a chamber to hold ice It’s a good idea if you want to have a nicer home-made piece.

Read full topic
